name: White Board Fight For Zoom
description:
Overview

Using the whiteboard feature in Zoom, an even number of players compete against each other to draw as many of their team’s mascot animal as possible. Additionally there is a game moderator who keeps time, but also has to guess the team’s animal at the end of the round. Each team is assigned a color and animal without the moderator knowing. Each round is two minutes long. Players can draw over the other team’s animals with their animals. The moderator decides which team has the most color and the most animals on the board and wins the round.

Goal

Draw as many of your team’s animal mascot as legible as possible in the right color in under two minutes. Convince the zoologist that your team has the most animals and color on the board. 

Requirements
  • Zoom 
  • Zoom Whiteboard feature 
  • Zoom breakout rooms 
  • A timer 
  • 4 + players plus a moderator 
Instructional Video
